'''Tripes du Port''' is a [[food]] item that the player can cook. The [[recipe]] for Tripes du Port is obtainable from [[Sanguinetti]] at [[Hotel Debord]] for 5,000 [[Mora]].

Depending on the quality, Tripes du Port revives and restores '''900'''/'''1,200'''/'''1,500''' HP to the target fallen character with a 120-second cooldown. Like most foods, this cannot target other players' characters in [[Co-Op Mode]].
